data.introduce: 如责任组 office 调用 Push 接口给被授权 OFFC 授权后，能通过本接口对该 PNR 收回授权，如果是包含读写权限的 PNR 授权，可以通过调用该接口收回 PNR 的全部授权或只收回写权限，保留读权限。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirPnrAuthPullRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PayType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PayType","children":[]},{"name":"@ChannelID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ChannelID","children":[]},{"name":"@IataCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"IataCode","children":[]},{"name":"@CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市代码","children":[]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PullAuthorityParam","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@PassengerNameRecord","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@PullWritePermissionOnly","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"收回写权限","children":[]},{"name":"@OrderId","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"orderId","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirPnrAuthPullRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR授权收回返回","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Response","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Result","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PassengerNameRecord","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR 号","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office 没有权限 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -311 ","name":null,"msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TES_AirPnrAuthPullRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- Office号 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="SHA384"/>
    </POS>
    <PullAuthorityParam PassengerNameRecord="JMGEBW" OrderId="" PullWritePermissionOnly=""/>
</TES_AirPnrAuthPullRQ>
